text: The women's 100 metre backstroke S6 event at the 2016 Paralympic Games took place on 8 September, at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium. Two heats were held, one with six swimmers and one with five. The swimmers with the eight fastest times advanced to the final. == Heats == === Heat 1 === 9:42 8 September 2016: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank ! Lane ! Name !
